name: Rush But Don't Crush - 3 line game
name_original: Rush But Don't Crush - 3 line game
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Swipe left or right to change line, avoid square obstacles and score as much as you can. As the game progresses it becomes harder and harder.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects.

Thank you!
